law.catch_line: Any person who may be injured by the making of any ditch or drain laid out as aforesaid, or who may ...
law.text: Any person who may be injured by the making of any ditch or drain laid out as aforesaid, or who may be assessed for any part of the costs thereof, may apply to the county commissioners at any time before the confirmation of the report for an order of review, and the county commissioners may, in their discretion, grant such order and appoint other drainage viewers to perform the same duty as under the original board of drainage viewers.
